verbs.description: As [ARG0: President Trump] [V: prepares] [ARG2: for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , Fox News anchor Bret Baier is revisiting another historic meeting involving a Republican president . Thirty years ago this month , President Ronald Reagan went to Moscow for a Cold War summit with Mikhail Gorbachev . Baier joins " CBS This Morning " to discuss his new book , " Three Days in Moscow : Ronald Reagan and the Fall of the Soviet Empire , " and what we can learn from Reagan 's approach to negotiations with the Soviet leader .
